info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Transylvania, Jackson and south central Haywood Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Sylva, or 5 miles northeast of Lake Glenville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brevard, Sylva, Cullowhee, Webster, Dillsboro, Cashiers, Lake Toxaway, Graveyard Fields, Lake Glenville and B.R. Parkway-Black Balsam To Mount Pisgah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
